channel.title: Crashing peoples clients?
channel.description:
Well, i made a command that crashes everyones client on the server. But it dosn't actually crash.
What i need is so that it completly crashes so they need to re-load it. I tried with Showing frame(9999999) etc, or interfaces, but it just logs out then they can log back in.
The reason i need it to crash is so they have to re-load, because loading my client downloads most of the major files, so if i update an npc they need to re-load to get the update.
Thanks

that wont crash there client so they need to reload it
that just will reboot server

item.title: Crashing peoples clients?

What i need is so that it completly crashes so they need to re-load it. I tried with Showing frame(9999999) etc, or interfaces, but it just logs out then they can log back in.
